t: Amazon's growing ties to oil industry irks some employees | AP News
s: April 25, 2021 - The online shopping giant, which already works with BP and Shell, has been trying to woo more oil and gas companies to use its technology to help them find drillable oil faster, angering workers who have been pushing Amazon to do more to combat climate change.
